name: Love Story: My Girl 'otome simulation game'
name_original: Love Story: My Girl 'otome simulation game'
description:
The most popular otome simulation game on the App Store!
All new storyline, all new game play, and all new experience!
Witness the magical transformation of your child.

Are you still playing those dull dress-up games?
Still looking at those lifeless pictures?
You are so behind!
Come play Love Story, the most popular love and simulation game!

Fate has chosen you to take care of a little girl.
Take an adventure, spend times together, and experience your own unique romance.

Game features:
- Simple game play, easy to pick-up
- Fine game graphics, adorable characters
- More than 30 game scenes, a diverse world to explore
- A variety of characters, full of personality and charisma
- Hundreds of game CGs to collect
- Rich and intertwined plot with 55 endings.
